fields.val: I (Mark Ignacio) am a web developer-cum-devops Computer Science student at the University of Central Florida. As a full stack web developer, I've designed and produced **Python** and **Javascript** web applications for both private and public sector clients. Information security is a big thing of mine. I competed nationally in the [Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition](http://www.nationalccdc.org) for UCF, am currently a participating member of the student-run [Hack@UCF](https://hackucf.org), and I occasionally do web-focused penetration tests!

Most of my dev experience is with Python's **Django** framework. As a web host in my spare time, I run and maintain installations of several **Wordpress**, **Mediawiki**, and custom PHP applications; a few of them can be seen below.
